subject: Re: Fw: Action Required: Excess Disk Usage on Your Hosting Plan
preview: Let's close this and come back when customer replies.

full_threads.body: Let's close this and come back when customer replies.

action.text: Cindy Valderama assigned to Joel Maligalig
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
Hi Samir,

No problems - hope you had a great break!

No problems on the staging item, I understand and happy to exclude that from the total if we can get the main site down.

Do you see a clear way to bring usage down (e.g. removing old media)?

We want to avoid the overage billing if we can.

Thanks again,
Andy

On Fri, Jun 20, 2025 at 12:27 PM support <support@designtiles.com.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,
Apologies for the delayed response - I've just returned from a holiday break.
Thank you for the update. I wanted to check whether a staging site is absolutely necessary, as we haven't set one up on our end. From what I understand, the staging site is primarily used by the Wolf IQ team to make changes before pushing updates to the live website.
Could you please confirm with the developer whether they require access to the entire website data to work on the backend? It would be helpful if we could limit the data size provided to only what is necessary for development, rather than sharing the entire site.

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta
 IT Support
 | Bachelors of IT |


Proudly Supporting

 ______________________

E:support@designtiles.com.au
P: (02) 9567 8971
A: 407 Princes Hwy, Rockdale, NSW 2216
wwww.designtiles.com.au

IMPORTANT: The contents of the email and any attachments are confidential.They are intended for the named recipients(s) only. If you have received this email by mistake, please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to anyone or make copies thereof.
From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, June 5, 2025 4:03 PM
To: support <support@designtiles.com.au>
Cc: Accounts <accounts@designtiles.com.au>; Daphne Bautista <daphne@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: Fw: Action Required: Excess Disk Usage on Your Hosting Plan

Hi Samir,

Thanks for your patience. It looks like that level of usage in April may have been an anomaly.

We're still at 83GB across the two sites (with only 20GB covered in T&Cs).

Is this something that could be managed down by the end of this month?

Thanks,
Andy



On Fri, May 9, 2025 at 1:41 PM Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Samir,

Thank you for this - looks like we might be having different numbers.

@Daphne Bautista will check if this has changed on our end and confirm early next week.

Thank you,
Andy

On Thu, May 8, 2025 at 11:38 AM support <support@designtiles.com.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,
I'm a bit confused regarding the website size. I can see that the live site is approximately 42 GB. Initially, you mentioned it was 137 GB, and the screenshot you shared showed 127 GB.
After checking, I found that the total size of the website, including the database, media, and theme files, is around 42 GB. Wolf IQ support also just confirmed that it's 42 GB.
137 GB seems unusually high for a site like ours.
Thanks,

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta
 IT Support
 | Bachelors of IT |

Hi Samir,

Thanks for getting back to me.

I think you might be looking at the Staging site only - there is also a live site.

Screenshot below. Do you see that one on your end?



Thanks,
Andy

On Tue, May 6, 2025 at 12:38 PM support <support@designtiles.com.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

Could you please provide more details regarding the 137GB of storage usage?

When I checked, our storage ( plugins, database, themes, media and others) appears to be sitting at 55.12GB, so I'm trying to understand where the discrepancy might be.

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta

Just following this up.

The grace period ends on May 30 and we'd love to find a solution with you before then.

Thanks again,

Andy

On Tue, Apr 22, 2025 at 8:20 AM Wolf IQ Support <support@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Hi Pelin,

Hope you're doing well.


We've reviewed our hosting environment and noticed that your site (Design Tiles) is currently using 137GB of disk space, exceeding our Fair Use Policy limit of 10GB per site.


We want to ensure Design Tiles continues to be successful so I've outlined the options below.


Let us know how you'd like to proceed. We are here to help!

Thanks,
Wolf IQ Support

****

What this means:

  • You're currently using over 13x the included storage.
  • We're providing a grace period until May 30, 2025 to reduce your usage.
  • After that, overage fees will apply: $10/month for every additional 10GB used beyond the 10GB limit.

What to do:

To ensure Wolf IQ can maintain performance and fairness across all client sites.

  • Please review and delete any large or outdated media files.
  • If you'd prefer to maintain your current usage, let us know and we'll arrange billing for the overage accordingly.
